subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Kevin Robinson will try to break a world record by soaring more than 26 ½ feet above the top of a 27-foot-high ramp on his bike on Thuesday.
snippet: Kevin Robinson will try to break a world record by soaring more than 26 ½ feet above the top of a 27-foot-high ramp on his bike on Thuesday.
